title: Check Prime Number
description: Write a Python function to check if a number is prime.
hint: Iterate through numbers from 2 to sqrt(n).

title: Reverse a String
description: Reverse a string without using slicing.
hint: Use a loop or recursion to reverse the string.

title: GCD of Two Numbers
description: Write a program to find the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two numbers.

title: Factorial using Recursion
description: Write a Python function to calculate the factorial of a number using recursion.
hint: Factorial of n is n * factorial(n-1).

title: Second Largest in a List
description: Find the second largest number in a list.
hint: Sort the list or iterate to find the second largest.
